teaser: The Israeli Prime Minister's speech was a chance for some to fundraise.
description: The Israeli Prime Minister's speech was a chance for some to fundraise.
contentencoded: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu began his address to Congress Tuesday by bemoaning the speech's politicization. But some groups and politicians saw the speech as the ultimate political opportunity: a chance to fundraise.
title: After a controversy in politics, money follows
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"
